description:
11.254 thumbnail
Select the most representative frame in a given sequence of consecutive frames.

The filter accepts the following options:


Since the filter keeps track of the whole frames sequence, a bigger n
value will result in a higher memory usage, so a high value is not recommended.
name: thumbnail

options.description: Set the frames batch size to analyze; in a set of n frames, the filter will pick one of them, and then handle the next batch of n frames until the end. Default is 100.
options.name: n

options.description: Set the log level to display picked frame stats. Default is info.
options.name: log
